scripts.db:start: docker run -d --name excalidraw-postgres -p 5433:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -e POSTGRES_DB=excalidraw -v excalidraw_postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:15-alpine
scripts.db:stop: docker stop excalidraw-postgres && docker rm excalidraw-postgres
scripts.db:nuke: docker stop excalidraw-postgres && docker rm excalidraw-postgres && docker volume rm excalidraw_postgres_data
